content:
ADDENDUM I TO THE PLAN OF OPERATIONS FOR THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES BY UNICEF FOR THE PRODUCTION OF TRIPLE VACCINE IN TAIWAN PROVINCE OF THE REPUBLIC OF CHINA TO IMPLEMENT A MASS IMMUNIZATION CAMPAIGN AGAINST DIPHTHERIA, TETANUS AND PERTUSSIS
The Government, the Organization and UNICEF, in accordance with Article VIII paragraph 2 of the Plan of Operations, agree to the following modifications of the Plan of Operations:
Article II, paragraph 2, should read "To immunize all children between the ages of 6 months and 10 years against diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis, by means of a mass immunization campaign."
0023
Article III, paragraph 2, should read "The proper utilization of equipment and supplies provided by UNICEF and FOA to produce triple vaccine (diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis) in quantities sufficient to immunize at least 200,000 children in the first year and 320,000 children in the * second and subsequent years. The target for production in the first year of operation is 500,000 ccs. and for the second and subsequent years, the target will be 800,000 ccs. After the first year of production, the capacities of the laboratory will be reviewed with the view to further stepping up production if this is at all possible." 140.112.215.04
Article III, paragraph 3, should read "As soon as vaccine becomes available, a mass immunization campaign will be started to cover the following groups in the indicated order of priority:
a) ) infants, six months to one year of age;
b) pre-school children, one to six years of age;
c) school children, six to ten years of age. "
Article III, paragraph 6, should read: "The full immunizing dose is 2-1/2 cc. containing 60,000 million pertussis organisms mixed with diphtheria and tetanus toxoids administered in three injections (0.5 cc .- 1.0 cc .- 1.0 cc.) at intervals of not less than one month and not more than three months .. Infants and pre-school children will be immunized at health stations, health centers and provincial hospitals .. School children will be immunized in the schools."
Article III, paragraph 7, should read: "The target for immunization of infants will be 10,000 per month in the first year of operation, beginning 1 September 1954, and 20,000 or more per month in the second and subsequent years. The target for immunization of pre-school children will be 8,000 per month in the first year of operation and 10,000 per month in the second and subsequent years. The immuniza- tion of school children will be carried out whenever required."
國史饭 Academia Historica
25

lines.content: ADDENDUM I TO THE PLAN OF OPERATIONS
FOR THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES BY UNICEF
FOR THE PRODUCTION OF TRIPLE VACCINE IN TAIWAN PROVINCE OF THE REPUBLIC OF CHINA
TO IMPLEMENT A MASS IMMUNIZATION CAMPAIGN AGAINST
DIPHTHERIA, TETANUS AND PERTUSSIS
The Government, the Organization and UNICEF, in accordance with
Article VIII paragraph 2 of the Plan of Operations, agree to the following
modifications of the Plan of Operations:
Article II, paragraph 2, should read "To immunize all
children between the ages of 6 months and 10 years
against diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis, by means
of a mass immunization campaign."
Article III, paragraph 2, should read "The proper utilization
of equipment and supplies provided by UNICEF and FOA
to produce triple vaccine (diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis)
in quantities sufficient to immunize at least 200,000
children in the first year and 320,000 children in the *
second and subsequent years. The target for production
in the first year of operation is 500,000 ccs. and for
the second and subsequent years, the target will be 800,000 ccs.
After the first year of production, the capacities of the
laboratory will be reviewed with the view to further
stepping up production if this is at all possible."
Article III, paragraph 3, should read "As soon as vaccine
becomes available, a mass immunization campaign will be
started to cover the following groups in the indicated
order of priority:
a)
) infants, six months to one year of age;
b)
pre-school children, one to six years of age;
c) school children, six to ten years of age. "
Article III, paragraph 6, should read: "The full immunizing
dose is 2-1/2 cc. containing 60,000 million pertussis
organisms mixed with diphtheria and tetanus toxoids
administered in three injections (0.5 cc .- 1.0 cc .- 1.0 cc.)
at intervals of not less than one month and not more than
three months .. Infants and pre-school children will be
immunized at health stations, health centers and provincial
hospitals .. School children will be immunized in the schools."
Article III, paragraph 7, should read: "The target for
immunization of infants will be 10,000 per month in the
first year of operation, beginning 1 September 1954, and
20,000 or more per month in the second and subsequent years.
The target for immunization of pre-school children will be
8,000 per month in the first year of operation and 10,000
per month in the second and subsequent years. The immuniza-
tion of school children will be carried out whenever required."

paragraphs.content: ADDENDUM I TO THE PLAN OF OPERATIONS FOR THE PROVISION OF EQUIPMENT AND SUPPLIES BY UNICEF FOR THE PRODUCTION OF TRIPLE VACCINE IN TAIWAN PROVINCE OF THE REPUBLIC OF CHINA TO IMPLEMENT A MASS IMMUNIZATION CAMPAIGN AGAINST DIPHTHERIA, TETANUS AND PERTUSSIS
The Government, the Organization and UNICEF, in accordance with Article VIII paragraph 2 of the Plan of Operations, agree to the following modifications of the Plan of Operations:
Article II, paragraph 2, should read "To immunize all children between the ages of 6 months and 10 years against diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis, by means of a mass immunization campaign."

Article III, paragraph 2, should read "The proper utilization of equipment and supplies provided by UNICEF and FOA to produce triple vaccine (diphtheria, tetanus and pertussis) in quantities sufficient to immunize at least 200,000 children in the first year and 320,000 children in the * second and subsequent years. The target for production in the first year of operation is 500,000 ccs. and for the second and subsequent years, the target will be 800,000 ccs. After the first year of production, the capacities of the laboratory will be reviewed with the view to further stepping up production if this is at all possible." 140.112.215.04
Article III, paragraph 3, should read "As soon as vaccine becomes available, a mass immunization campaign will be started to cover the following groups in the indicated order of priority:
a) ) infants, six months to one year of age;
b) pre-school children, one to six years of age;
c) school children, six to ten years of age. "

Article III, paragraph 6, should read: "The full immunizing dose is 2-1/2 cc. containing 60,000 million pertussis organisms mixed with diphtheria and tetanus toxoids administered in three injections (0.5 cc .- 1.0 cc .- 1.0 cc.) at intervals of not less than one month and not more than three months .. Infants and pre-school children will be immunized at health stations, health centers and provincial hospitals .. School children will be immunized in the schools."

Article III, paragraph 7, should read: "The target for immunization of infants will be 10,000 per month in the first year of operation, beginning 1 September 1954, and 20,000 or more per month in the second and subsequent years. The target for immunization of pre-school children will be 8,000 per month in the first year of operation and 10,000 per month in the second and subsequent years. The immuniza- tion of school children will be carried out whenever required."
